name: build_story_examples
description: Build story graph with scenario outlines and examples tables (ONLY when decision criteria chooses Scenario Outline)
process: Load existing story graph from project area
For each story, review scenarios from specification_scenarios stage
Identify scenarios that need data variation
Convert scenarios to Scenario Outlines with Examples tables
Add scenario_outlines to story in graph
Save updated story graph to project area
Skip this step - use regular scenarios only
